Name: OtherMaterialReference
Description: Specification of an external interviewer instruction not structured in DDI. Uses the structure of OtherMaterial to provide a citation, description, and locator for the object. TypeOfOtherMaterial should be set to ExternalInterviewInstruction.

Name: InstructionAttachmentLocation
Description: Allows attachment of an instruction to a specific item in a question structure. For example, to a Label, QuestionText, ResponseDomain, Response domain value, or grid cell.

Name: IsDisplayed
Description: If set to "true" indicates that the instruction should always be displayed, not just upon need.
